abilityGolden.description:
You turn into a crate, hidden to all but the most observant adventurers, also prevents movement since you have no legs.

This uses crate modifiers. Perfect for board players.

Attempts to cure 1 curse effect every 3 seconds for 9 sec.

This ability has no cooldown if your Primary Stat is Spirit.

If your Primary Stat is not Spirit, the duration is 3 sec while in an arena.

Attempts to cure 1 disease effect every 3 seconds for 9 sec.

This ability has no cooldown if your Primary Stat is Spirit.

If your Primary Stat is not Spirit, the duration is 3 sec while in an arena.

Attempts to cure 1 poison effect every 3 seconds for 9 sec.

This ability has no cooldown if your Primary Stat is Spirit.

If your Primary Stat is not Spirit, the duration is 3 sec while in an arena.

Unleash Absolute Zero around you, dealing 214 Frost damage every 2 seconds and afflicting enemies with Absolute Zero, reducing their movement speed by 20%. Stacks 5 times and stuns for 3 sec at max stacks.

Scales with Frost Nova modifiers.

Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 100% for 15 sec.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

You fire an explosive charge at the target area, dealing 270 to 338 Fire damage to enemies within. The charge continues to deal damage every second for 2 sec.

This uses Explosive Shot modifiers.

An aimed shot that deals 210% weapon damage plus 0 and reduces healing done to that target by 30%. Lasts 6 sec.
Does not stack with other similar effects.

You surrender your physical form to the power of the elements, transforming into a being of raw elemental energy for 15 sec. Your Stormstrike has a 30 yard range and deals extra Nature damage. The cooldown of Stormstrike is reset when using any Shaman Shock, Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning.

Heals your target for 444 and applies Alligned for 8 sec. Aligning Time-bound allies will cause additional Temporal Distortion.

Casting Align consumes 5 energy, if Temporal Distortion or Eternity is known.

This uses Moonfire modifiers.

Alter the fabric of time, causing the caster to return to their current location, their health and mana, when cast a second time, or after 4 sec. Any self-applied, magic dispellable effects are also returned to their previous state.

Effect negated if the caster dies within the 4 sec or before the effect occurs, or moves too far away.
Ambush the target, causing 305% weapon damage plus 91 to the target. Must be stealthed and behind the target. Requires a dagger in the main hand. Awards 2 combo points.

Amplifies magic used against the targeted party member, increasing magic damage taken by 5% and healing spells by 5%.  Lasts 10 min.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Returns the spirit to the body, restoring a dead target to life with 65 health and 120 mana.  Cannot be cast when in combat.

Place a feather at the target location, lasting for 15 sec. If allies walk through it, they gain 50% increased movement speed for 4 sec.

Max 3 charges. 20 second recharge timer.
Shapeshift into aquatic form, increasing swim speed by 50% and allowing the druid to breathe underwater.  Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects.
Launches several missiles at the enemy target, causing 377 to 459 Arcane damage.

Blasts the target with energy, dealing 631 Arcane damage.  Each time you cast Arcane Blast, the damage of all Arcane spells is increased by 15% and mana cost of Arcane Blast is increased by 125%.  Effect stacks up to 4 times and lasts 6 sec or until any Arcane spell that deals damage except Arcane Blast is cast.

A powerful shot that deals 75% weapon damage plus 431 as Arcane.

This uses Aimed Shot modifiers.
Causes an explosion of arcane magic around the caster, causing 40 to 45 Arcane damage to all targets within 10 yards.

Increases the target's Intellect by 2 and spell power by 2 for 30 min.
Does not stack with other similar effects.
Launches Arcane Missiles at the enemy, causing 22 Arcane damage every 0.64 sec for 3.21 sec.

Launches an Arcane Orb forward from your position, traveling up to 35 yards, dealing Arcane damage to enemies it passes through and increasing their Arcane damage taken from you by 10%. Subsequent hits on the same target deals 50% less damage.

When activated, your spells and abilities deal 15% more magic damage while costing 15% more mana to cast.  This effect lasts 15 sec.
Does not stack with other similar effects.

This ability can be used while in Cat, Bear, Moonkin or Tree of Life Shapeshifts.
An instant shot that causes 10 Arcane damage.

Absorbs 165 Arcane damage. Lasts 30 sec.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Causes an explosion of arcane magic around the caster, causing 130 Arcane damage to all targets within 12 yards.

This uses Arcane Explosion modifiers.

Unleash pure frost that deals 622 Frost damage and an additional 185 Frost damage over 12 sec.

This uses Pyroblast modifiers and shares a cooldown.
Your ranged attacks also fire Arrows of Fire and consume 2% of your maximum mana. You cannot regenerate mana while active.
Your ranged attacks now shoot Arrows of Frost and consume 1% of your maximum mana. You cannot regenerate mana while active.
Take on the Aspects of a Beast, becoming untrackable and increasing melee attack power by 5% for you and your pet.  Only one Aspect can be active at a time.
You take on the aspects of a cheetah, increasing movement speed by 30%.  If struck, you will be dazed for 4 sec.  Only one Aspect can be active at a time.
The hunter takes on the aspects of a hawk, increasing ranged attack power by 16.  Only one Aspect can be active at a time.
The hunter takes on the aspects of a monkey, increasing chance to dodge by 2%.  Only one Aspect can be active at a time.

The hunter and raid members within 40 yards take on the aspects of a pack of cheetahs, increasing movement speed by 30%.  If you are struck under the effect of this aspect, you will be dazed for 4 sec.  Only one Aspect can be active at a time.

The hunter takes on the aspect of the viper, causing ranged and melee attacks a chance to regenerate mana but reducing your total damage and healing done by 40%. In addition, you gain 4% of maximum mana every 3 sec. 

Only one Aspect can be active at a time. Does not work with Mana-forged Barrier.
The hunter, group and raid members within 40 yards take on the aspect of the wild, increasing Nature resistance by 45.  Only one Aspect can be active at a time.

Deals 391 to 416 Spellfire damage to the target.

This uses Starfire modifiers.

Deals 577 to 619 Spellfire damage to the target.

This uses Starsurge modifiers.
Yanks the caster through the twisting nether back to Kargath.  Speak to an Innkeeper in a different place to change your home location.

You call down spiritual ancestors, dealing 2341 to 2453 Astral damage to the target. Castable while moving. 

This uses Thunderstorm modifiers.

Summons an Atal'ai Totem with 5 health at your feet for 1.25 min that repeatedly attacks an enemy within 20 yards, dealing 11 to 14 Nature damage.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted. This uses Searing Totem modifiers and benefits from the Call of Flame talent.

Reduces the duration of Disorient, Fear, Incapacitate, and Polymorph effects on you by 50%. 

Enhances your Paladin Auras to grant immunity to Silence and Interrupt effects for all affected allies and increases the effectiveness of all auras by 100%. Lasts 6 sec.
Automatically shoots the target until cancelled. This damage does not scale with spell power.

Transform into an unstoppable colossus for 12 sec, causing you to deal 5% increased Physical damage and take 25% less damage. Every 4 sec your power shifts, increasing Physical damage by 5%, but you take 10% more damage.

While in this state you move at 80% speed and it can't be reduced nor increased from that amount. You are also immune to immobilizing effects.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Hurls a holy shield at the enemy, dealing 485 to 581 Holy damage, Dazing them and then jumping to additional nearby enemies.  Affects 3 total targets.  Lasts 6 sec.

Backstab the target, causing 250% weapon damage plus 18 to the target.  Deals 20% increased damage from behind. Must be behind the target if it is a player. Requires a dagger in the main hand.  Awards 1 combo point.

Banishes the enemy target, preventing all action but making it invulnerable for up to 20 sec (8 seconds on players).  Only one target can be banished at a time.  Casting Banish on a banished target will cancel the spell.  Only works on Demons and Elementals.

Unleash a horrifying wail, stunning 10 nearby enemies and draining 317 of their life every 1 second for 3 sec.

This spell cannot miss.

This uses Drain Life modifiers.

Fire an arrow to set a trap at the target location. When triggered, it ensnares the enemy, reducing their movement speed by 30% and causing them to bleed, dealing 279 damage every 2 seconds for 10 sec. 

The trap remains active for 30 sec. Only one trap can be active at a time.

Shares a cooldown with Immolation Trap and Explosive Trap.

The caster's skin becomes as tough as bark.  All damage taken is reduced by 15%.  While protected, damaging attacks will not cause spellcasting delays.  This spell is usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared or asleep.  Usable in all forms.  Lasts 12 sec.

Stuns the target for 3 sec and interrupts non-player spellcasting for 3 sec.

This spell cannot miss.

Battle charge the enemy, dealing 250% weapon damage and generating 9 rage.

Gap closer ability. Shares an 8 sec cooldown with other gap closer abilities.

This ability is useable while shapeshifted.

This uses Charge modifiers. Usable in melee range.

Increases the Strength and Agility of all raid and party members within 30 yards by 2.  Lasts 30 min.
Does not stack with other similar effects.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
A balanced combat stance that increases the armor penetration of all of physical attacks by 10% and gives your Rend damage over time effect a chance to critically hit.

The target becomes a Beacon of Light to all members of your party or raid within a 60 yard radius. Any direct heals you cast on party or raid members will also heal the Beacon for 40% of the amount healed.  Only one target can be the Beacon of Light at a time. Lasts 1 min.

The friendly target becomes a Beacon of Shadow.  Dealing damage with Shadow Bolt heals your Beacon for 5% of the damage dealt. This healing is increased to 25% while in spirit allocation.

Only one target can be the Beacon of Shadow at a time. Cannot be cast on self. Lasts 1800 seconds.

Shapeshift into Bear Form, increasing melee attack power by 30, armor contribution from cloth and leather items by 65%, and Stamina by 15%. Allows the use of various Bear abilities.

If your Primary Stat is Agility or Strength, shapeshifting into Bear Form will free you from all movement impairing effects.
You master the art of Beast training, teaching you the ability to tame Exotic pets and increasing your total amount of Pet Skill Points by 6. Requires Tame Beast to function properly.

When activated, this ability causes your Mangle abilities to hit up to 3 targets and have no cooldown, and reduces the cost of all your Cat Form and Bear Form abilities by 50%. While active your Savage Defense absorb effect is doubled and Cat combo point generators grant 4 additional combo points (1 vs players). Lasts 10 sec.

You enter a Berserker Rage, removing any Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
An aggressive stance. Your melee and ranged critical strike chance is increased by 3%.

Send your tamed beast or tamed dragonkin into a rage causing 30% additional damage for 8 sec.  While enraged, the beast does not feel pity or remorse or fear and it cannot be stopped unless killed.

Does not stack with other similar effects.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Fires an opening shot dealing 210% weapon damage plus 96. Only usable on enemies above 80% health.

Scales with Aimed Shot modifiers
Binds the target hostile elemental for up to 50 sec. The bound unit is unable to move, attack or cast spells. Any damage caused will release the target. Only one target can be bound at a time.
Heals a friendly target and the caster for 352 to 415.  Low threat.
Fires a Black Arrow at the target dealing 280 Shadow damage every 3 over 15 sec.

A poisonous strike dealing 332 Physical damage and an additional 190 Nature damage every 3 seconds for 15 sec. 

This uses Black Arrow modifiers.

Increases your melee attack speed by 20%. In addition, attacks strike an additional nearby opponent. Lasts 20 sec. Can't be active at the same time as Sweeping Strikes or Bloodbath. This ability Shares a cooldown with Sweeping Strikes, and Bloodbath.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Instantly Whirlwind up to 6 nearby targets and for the next 6 sec you will perform a whirlwind attack every 1 sec.  While under the effects of Bladestorm, you can move but cannot perform any other abilities but you do not feel pity or remorse or fear and you cannot be stopped unless disarmed or killed.
A wave of flame radiates outward from the caster, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for 177 to 214 Fire damage, knocking them back and dazing them for 6 sec.
Instantly shields you, absorbing 347 damage and making you immune to pushback. Lasts 20 sec. If the shield breaks, a Blast Nova slows enemies for 3 sec.

Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing total stats by 5% for 30 min. 
Does not stack with other similar effects.

Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing their Strength and Agility by 2 for 30 min.
Does not stack with other similar effects.
Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing healing received by 6% for 30 min. In addition, when the target blocks, parries, or dodges a melee attack the target will gain 6% of base mana.

Places a Blessing on the friendly target, restoring 13 mana every 5 seconds for 30 min.
Does not stack with other similar effects.

Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for up to 6 sec.  Any damage caused will remove the effect.

This spell cannot miss.

A Finishing move that deals damage to the target and  two additional enemies.

 1 point: 66 - 78 damage.
 2 points: 128 - 140 damage.
 3 points: 190 - 205 damage.
 4 points: 255 - 263 damage.
 5 points: 313 - 325 damage. 

This uses Revenge modifiers.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yards, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec.

Teleports the caster 20 yards forward, unless something is in the way.  Also frees the caster from stuns and bonds.

Shares an 8 second cooldown with other Blink spells.
Ice shards pelt the target area doing 269 Frost damage over 6.42 sec.

A magical attack that deals 90% ranged weapon damage as Shadow and transfers 9 health every 1 sec from the target to the caster for 5 sec.

This uses Drain Life modifiers.

While channeling, encases yourself in a barrier of blood, making you immune to silence, stun and interrupt effects. Any time an enemy within 15 yards deals non-periodic damage to you, you drain their health and cause them to run in horror for 3 sec.

For the next 5 sec, causes your Physical melee abilities to deal 51 bleed damage over 5 sec and reduces the movement speed of the target by 30% for 3 sec. This ability shares a cooldown with Sweeping Strikes, and Blade Flurry.

This ability can be used while shapeshifted.

Generates 20 rage at the cost of health, and then generates an additional 10 rage over 10 sec.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Instantly attack the target causing 21 damage. Each bleed applied by you increases the damage of Bloodthirst by 8%, up to a maximum of 40%. In addition, the next successful melee attack will restore 1% of max health. This effect lasts 8 sec. Damage is based on your attack power.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Heals all allies within 40 yards affected by your Seed of Life.

Requires  Primary Stat: Spirit
Launches a blooming shot that deals 125 Astral damage to enemies, heals 5 allies for 43, and grants them Grove Blessing.

Requires 5 seconds to fully bloom another shot after firing, which doubles its damage and healing. Can be cast while moving.

This uses Arcane Shot modifiers.

Requires  Single One-Handed Weapon
While active, your parries cause an immediate follow-up attack and reduce Blurred Blade's duration by 1 second.

Finishing move that increases melee attack speed by 10% and decreases magic damage taken by 8%. Lasts longer per combo point:
1 point : 9 seconds
2 points: 12 seconds
3 points: 15 seconds
4 points: 18 seconds
5 points: 21 seconds.

This cannot stack with and uses Slice and Dice modifiers. The duration cannot be refreshed by any effects.

Fire a bone arrow that deals 195 Physical damage and causes the target to bleed for 22 damage every 3 seconds with a chance to trigger your Rapid Killing talent. Stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 12 sec.

Max 2 charges. 30 second recharge timer. Hunter ranged and melee ability casts have a chance to restore a charge.

This can only trigger Rapid Killing once every 10 seconds.

Throw a Bone Spear that pierces through armor and resistances, dealing 430 Shadowstrike damage and applying Bone Speared.

Max 2 charges. Your physical melee abilities have a chance to grant a charge.
Throw a bone that bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 248 Shadowstrike damage. This ability causes high threat.
Restores 2% missing mana every 1 second to all party members within 35 yards for 21 sec.

Channel energy into your shield, raising a mighty bulwark that grants you 100% block chance and causes you to retaliate against all incoming attacks, but reduces your movement speed by 50%. 

Only castable at maximum energy and drains more energy the longer you channel.

This uses Shield Block modifiers.

Drains 5% of your maximum health every 2 seconds to increase your movement speed by 50%. This damage does not break crowd control effects. Also allows you to cast Fire spells while moving, and movement-impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts for 6 sec.

Thorns emerge from your ally's armor for 30 sec, damaging nearby enemies and granting Thornscale when struck.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Thornscale can only occur once every 8 seconds and the damage effect can only occur once every second.

Focus on the target, calibrating your aim. Firing a Shot when you are at the center of the channel
empowers future Shots, increasing their critical strike damage by 5% and causing them to ignore 10% of your target's armor, stacks 3 times and lasts for 20 sec.

Summons 3 Fungarians to assault enemies for 30 sec, emitting a Cloud of Rot that suffocates nearby enemies.

Can't be used while having an active pet.

This uses Force of Nature modifiers.
Simultaneously places up to 4 totems specified in the Totem Bar. Can call different totems than Call of the Elements.
Simultaneously places up to 4 totems specified in the Totem Bar.
Simultaneously places up to 4 totems specified in the Totem Bar. Can call different totems than Call of the Elements or Call of the Ancestors.

Summons an Air totem with 5 health within 20 yards that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and then explodes after 2 sec to deal Nature damage and stun all enemies within 8 yards for 4 sec.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Encases you in blood and bones. Reduces physical damage taken by 10%, heals you for 91 and deals 422 to 460 damage to nearby enemies every second.

Lasts for 4 sec. Duration is doubled in Bear Form.

Wounds the target causing them to bleed for 40 damage plus an additional 16 over 15 sec.

This uses Rend modifiers.

Deals 337 Shadow damage to enemies in a cone in front of you and reduces their healing received by 25% for 10 sec.

This ability is useable while shapeshifted.

Shapeshift into cat form, increasing melee attack power by 60 plus 25% of Agility. Allows the use of various cat abilities.

If your Primary Stat is Agility or Strength, shapeshifting into Cat Form will free you from all movement impairing effects.
Deals 857 Fire damage to 6 enemies within 8 yards, increasing your Fire damage dealt to them by 0%.

Requires  Primary Stat: Spirit
Hurls a fiery ball that deals 14 to 22 Fire damage and an additional 5 Fire damage over 14 sec to enemies or 12 to 18 Radiant healing and an additional 7 Radiant healing over 14 sec to allies.

This uses Fireball modifiers. Immunity spells prevent this healing and does not benefit from range increasing effects.

Heals the friendly target for 192 to 214, then jumps to heal additional nearby targets.  If cast on a party member, the heal will only jump to other party members.  Each jump reduces the effectiveness of the heal by 40%.  Heals 3 total targets.

Heals the friendly target for 192 to 214, then jumps to heal additional nearby targets.  If cast on a party member, the heal will only jump to other party members.  Each jump reduces the effectiveness of the heal by 40%.  Heals 3 total targets.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 273 to 309 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies.  Each jump reduces the damage by 40%.  Affects 3 total targets.
Forces all nearby enemies within 10 yards to focus attacks on you for 6 sec.
Forces all enemies within 10 yards to focus attacks on you for 6 sec.
Sends a bolt of chaotic fire at the enemy, dealing 964 to 1233 Fire damage. Chaos Bolt cannot be resisted, and pierces through all absorption, deflection, and reflection effects.

Afflicts the enemy with chaotic fire, dealing 360 Shadowflame damage every 3 for 15 sec. Chaos Burn cannot be resisted, and pierces through all absorption effects. 

This uses Chaos Bolt modifiers.

Calls a meteor down on the target location after 2 seconds, dealing 989 Fire damage and disorienting enemies for 3 seconds. 

This uses Chaos Bolt modifiers. This ability is usable while shapeshifted. Ignite damage does not break this disorient effect.

Charge an enemy, generate 9 rage, and root it for 1.50 sec.

Max 2 charges. 16 second recharge timer.

Gap closer ability. Shares an 8 sec cooldown with other gap closer abilities.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Finishing move that applies Charred Bite and deals fire damage per combo point:

    1 point : 17-19 damage
    2 points: 33-35 damage
    3 points: 55-35 damage
    4 points: 83-85 damage
    5 points: 118-120 damage

This uses Ferocious Bite modifiers.

Stuns the target for 2 sec seconds.  Must be stealthed.  Awards 2 combo points.

This spell cannot miss.

Deals 210% ranged weapon damage, refreshing the current Stings on your target and triggering extra effects if the Stings are active:

Serpent Sting - Instantly deals 90% of the damage done by your Serpent Sting. 

Viper Sting - Instantly restores mana to you equal to 30% of the total amount drained by your Viper Sting.

Scorpid Sting - Disarms the target for 4 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once per 1 minute.
Heals up to 5 friendly party or raid members within 18 yards of the target for 175 to 200. Circle of Healing shares a cooldown with Wild Growth.

Create an empowered Halo, forming a potent ring of Holy energy around you that rapidly expands, healing 10 party and raid members within 30 yards for 377 to 401. Heals with greater effect the closer the target is. 

This uses Halo modifiers.
Claw the enemy, causing 15 additional damage.  Awards 1 combo point.

Cleanses a friendly target, removing 1 poison effect, 1 disease effect and 1 magic effect.

The cooldown of this spell is reduced from 6 sec to 3 sec if your Primary Stat is Spirit.

In 2v2 and 3v3 it can only be used on other friendly targets if your Primary Stat is Spirit.

Cleanse the spirit of a friendly target, removing 1 poison effect, 1 disease effect, and 1 curse effect.

This ability has no cooldown if your Primary Stat is Spirit.

Summons a Cleansing Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster that attempts to remove 1 disease and 1 poison effect from party members within 30 yards every 3 seconds.  Lasts 15 sec.This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
A sweeping attack that does your weapon damage plus 13 to the target and his nearest ally.

Requires  Primary Stat: Spirit
Emits sanctified light in all directions, healing 5 allies within 10 yards for 383.

This uses Blinding Light modifiers.

Summons a totem at your feet with 5 health for 15 sec that collects power from all of your healing spells. When the totem expires or dies, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within 40 yards for 30% of all Nature healing done while it was active, divided evenly among targets.

Casting this spell a second time recalls the totem and releases the healing.

When activated, your next direct damage Rogue ability has 100% increased critical strike chance, 20% increased damage (10% versus players) and is usable from 10 yards. When consumed you will gain 4% melee and ranged critical strike chance for 15 sec.
When activated, this spell resets the cooldown on all Mage Frost spells you recently cast.
Smashes a target for 200% weapon damage, which ignores armor, to weaken their defenses, allowing your attacks to bypass 30% of their armor for 6 sec.

Enter a state of heightened defensive awareness. Each time you're hit by a spell or ability you reduce your overall damage taken by 5% (3% versus players) for 10 sec, stacking 5 times. Lasts 20 sec or until not attacked for 10 sec.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

When activated, this spell increases your critical strike damage bonus with Mage Fire damage spells by 150% (75% versus players), and causes each of your Mage Fire damage spell hits to increase your critical strike chance with Mage Fire damage spells by 10%.  This effect lasts 30 seconds, which renews every time you gain a stack, or until you have caused 3 non-periodic critical strikes with Mage Fire spells.

Finishing move that reduces healing done to the target by 40% for 6 seconds and deals ranged weapon damage per combo point plus 2:
   1 point:  240% weapon damage.
   2 points: 295% weapon damage.
   3 points: 350% weapon damage.
   4 points: 405% weapon damage.
   5 points: 460% weapon damage.

This ability can be recast within 3 seconds to fire a Combo Shot.

This uses Aimed Shot modifiers.
All party or raid members within 100 yards lose 50% less casting or channeling time when damaged.  Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

Stuns the opponent for 3.50 sec and deals 16 damage (based on attack power). Also causes a high amount of threat.

This spell cannot miss.
A shot that deals 90% weapon damage and dazes the target, slowing movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
Targets in a cone in front of the caster take 121 to 134 Frost damage and are slowed by 40% for 6 sec.

Consumes an Immolate or Shadowflame effect on the enemy target to instantly deal damage equal to 80% of your Immolate or Shadowflame, and causes an additional 70% damage over 6 sec. This periodic damage may critically strike.

Conjures 10 muffins, providing the mage and his allies with something to eat.

Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than 15 minutes.
Conjures a mana agate that can be used to instantly restore 314 to 337 mana.  3 charges.

Conjures 10 bottles of water, providing the mage and his allies with something to drink.

Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than 15 minutes.
Consecrates the land beneath the Paladin, doing 157 Holy damage over 8 sec to enemies who enter the area.

A wave of flame radiates outward from the caster, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for 177 to 214 Fire damage and dazing them for 6 sec.

This uses Blast Wave modifiers.

You call down a precise bolt of lightning, restoring 20% mana, granting you Controlled Storm, and dealing 800 to 912 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

This uses Thunderstorm modifiers.

You summon a controlled Typhoon that deals 460 Nature damage when in hits hostile targets, dazing them for 4 sec.

This uses Typhoon modifiers.

Corrupts the target, causing 44 Shadow damage over 12 sec.

Periodic damage from Corruption can critically strike while in Wildcard
A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack.  This attack deals 50 damage and immobilizes the target for 2 sec.  Counterattack cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

Counters the enemy's spellcast, preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 5 sec.  Generates a high amount of threat. This ability shares a cooldown with other interrupts.

This spell cannot miss.
Cower, causing no damage but lowering your threat a large amount, making enemies less likely to attack you.
While applied to target weapon it increases damage dealt by spells by 1% and spell critical strike rating by 5. This effect lasts for 2 hours.

Creates a Minor Healthstone that can be used to instantly restore 100 health.

Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than 15 minutes.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Creates a Minor Soulstone.  The Soulstone can be used to store one target's soul.  If the target dies while his soul is stored, he will be able to resurrect with 400 health and 700 mana.

Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than 15 minutes.
While applied to target weapon it increases damage dealt by periodic spells by 2% and spell haste rating by 7. This effect lasts for 2 hours.

Increase your Block chance by 10% and blocking deals 75 Holy damage to the attacker.

This uses Holy Shield modifiers. This effect can only occur once every second.

Finishing move that slashes at the flesh of all enemies within 8 yards, dealing Physical damage and causing them to bleed per combo point:
   1 point: 20 physical damage and 80 bleed damage over 8 sec.
   2 points: 36 physical damage and 103 bleed damage over 8 sec.
   3 points: 52 physical damage and 126 bleed damage over 8 sec.
   4 points: 67 physical damage and 149 bleed damage over 8 sec.
   5 points: 83 physical damage and 173 bleed damage over 8 sec.

An instant strike that causes 125% weapon damage.

Max 3 charges. 4 seconds recharge timer.

Slams the ground with a holy hammer, stunning all enemies around you for 4 sec.

This uses Hammer of Justice modifiers.
Removes 2 diseases from the friendly target.
Cures 2 poison effects on the target.
Cures 1 poison effect and 1 disease effect on a friendly target.

Curses the target with agony, causing 60 Shadow damage over 24 sec.  This damage is dealt slowly at first, and builds up as the Curse reaches its full duration.

Periodic damage from Curse of Agony can critically strike while in Wildcard

Curses the target with impending doom, causing 3200 Shadow damage after 1 min.  If the target yields experience or honor when it dies from this damage, a Doomguard will be summoned.  Cannot be cast on players.
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.

Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 20%. Lasts 30 sec (12 seconds on players).
Does not stack with other similar effects.

Target's attack power is reduced by 21 and armor is reduced by 5% for 2 min.

Does not stack with other similar effects.

Curses the target for 5 min (20 seconds on players), reducing Arcane, Fire, Frost, Holy, Nature, and Shadow resistances by 45 and increasing magic damage taken by 6%.
Does not stack with other similar effects.

This ability can be used while Shapeshifted.

Reduces the target's movement speed by 35% and deals 202 Plague damage every 2 seconds for 10 sec.

This uses Curse of Exhaustion modifiers.

Dampens magic used against the targeted party member, decreasing magic damage taken by 5% and healing spells by 5%.  Lasts 10 min.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Increases your Maximum Health by 25%, Armor Contribution from Cloth Items by 250%, Dodge Rating by 25% of your Spell Power, and all resistances by 30.

Significantly increases threat and makes you immune to interrupt effects, but reduces your damage and healing dealt by 30%.

While in Dark Apotheosis, your Immolate is instant, grants you Immolation Aura for 8 sec and restores 20% base mana, but has a 6 sec cooldown.

You can use all schools and spells in Dark Apotheosis. Demons never hide behind cover against a foe, as such you cannot wear a shield.

You take 25% increased damage versus players.

Increases the damage of your Demon Pet by 30%, and causes them to regenerate 100 mana and 100 health every 2 seconds for 12 sec.

This uses Fel Domination modifiers.

Places a Dark Iron Land Mine on the ground. The next hostile creature to pass near the mine will cause it to explode, Mines are unstable and only last for 30 sec. 

This uses Explosive Trap modifiers.
Drains 305 of your summoned demon's mana, returning 100% to you.
